`{bm-disable-all}`

ArithmeticConversions.py produced the following alternate forms ...

```
mul_to_exp with input a*a ...
    (a*a) ⟶ (a^2)
mul_to_exp with input 9*9 ...
    (9*9) ⟶ (9^2)
exp_to_mul with input a^3 ...
    (a^3) ⟶ (a*(a*a))
exp_to_mul with input 9^3 ...
    (9^3) ⟶ (9*(9*9))
```

</div>

`{bm-enable-all}`
